description: Smallest absolute value of a remainder when the larger of n and its reverse is divided by the smaller.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,1000
prog: (PARI) { for (n=0, 1000, x=n; r=0; while (x>0, d=x-10*(x\10); x\=10; r=r*10 + d); m=min(n, r); a=max(n, r)%m; write("b061649.txt", n, " ", min(a, m-a)) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 25 2009]
author: _Erich Friedman_, Jun 16 2001
